text.p: Albacore - (built 1977) 71,730 dwt 14 on 42 plus 1.5 del Haypoint 1-5/9 two to three loaded legs redel Atlantic redel $3,750 first forty days $7,500 balance plus $85,000 bb Docenave (amended).
Tatry - (built 1990) 66,088 dwt 13.6 on 31.1 plus three del USNH 1-10/9 three to five months $9,000 daily plus $100,000 bb Cosco.
Angelic Faith - (built 1984) 65,772 dwt 15 on 39 plus three del USG 2-10/9 trip redel Taiwan $11,000 daily plus $150,000 bb NSAC.
Golden Glow - (built 1981) 63,990 dwt 13 on 34 plus 2.5 del Singapore spot two to four months redel Far East $7,250 daily PanOcean.
California - (built 1982) 63,284 dwt 13 on 35 plus 2.5 del Port Kembla 10-15/9 trip redel Bin Qasim $6,500 daily plus $110,000 Korea Line.
Flag Rolaco - (built 1976) 61,470 dwt 12.5 on 35 plus 2.2 del USG 5-10/9 trip redel Egypt $7,000 daily $100,000 bb NNC.
